update student_marks
modifier_id=#userId#
marks=#marks#
,issue_status='RES',modification_time=now(),teacher_remarks=concat(ifnull(teacher_remarks,''),' ',#status#,' at ',now()) where university_code=#universityId# and entity_id=#entityId# and program_course_key=#programCourseKey# and course_code=#courseCode# and evaluation_id=#evaluationId# and roll_number=#rollNumber# and semester_start_date=#semesterStartDate# and semester_end_date=#semesterEndDate#;
